entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
